feed.title: Satoshilabs secret shared private key scheme

entry.title: Satoshilabs secret shared private key scheme
entry.summary: Peter Todd, a user, asked for clarification about the "plausible deniability" feature in Trezor's advanced settings. The explanation of this feature can be found on the Trezor website under the Multi-Passphrase Encryption & Hidden Wallets section. The feature allows users to create multiple wallets with different passphrases, which can provide plausible deniability if someone demands access to their wallet. Pavol Rusnak, the CTO of SatoshiLabs, signed off on the email response.
